title: Coping with the Loss of a Fusional Partner: Suggestions and Considerations.
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discusses the potential danger of losing a loved one in a relationship that is too fused. The concept of a fused relationship is defined as a closed relationship where the couple lives only for each other, and one is the possession of the other. The trauma resulting from the loss of a loved one can be intensive, and it is essential to provide appropriate suggestions to cope with it. However, it is crucial to avoid making suggestions that reinforce the possessive relationship between the couple. In contrast, some authors suggest that the loss of a loved one can be an opportunity for the remaining partner to gain freedom and space. In this last part (200 tokens), the author will explore more in-depth these two different perspectives on how to deal with the loss of a loved one in a fused relationship.
content: Es necesario que se proporcionen sugestiones apropiadas en el momento justo, para hacerle frente a esta eventualidad. Una idea importante es la de evitar formular sugestiones que refuercen todavía más la relación de pareja, y que una a los dos amantes en una relación de propiedad recíproca todavía mayor ( " unidos hasta la muerte ", " no quiero vivir sin ti ", y cosas semejantes que dicen a veces los enamorados ): tenga en cuenta que si todo sale bien ( que os auguro de corazón ) y vuestra relación actual dura para el resto de la vida, es muy probable que no mueran al mismo tiempo, por lo tanto, es muy estúpido no proporcionar sugestiones antagónicas adecuadas. En el extremo opuesto, no siempre se puede aplicar lo que sugieren varios autores, que en sus seminarios aconsejan que se considere la pérdida de la persona amada como una especie de oportunidad, por lo tanto, un " acontecimiento positivo ", porque permite a la persona que quedó recobrar una mayor libertad y un mayor " espacio". Esta actitud puede ser válida cuando la relación precedente era limitante, pero una relación puede también ser expansiva.
last_phrase: In conclusion, it is important to provide appropriate suggestions when dealing with the loss of a loved one. While it may be tempting to reinforce the idea of a lifelong partnership, it is crucial to provide conflicting suggestions that allow individuals to overcome their feelings of emptiness. In dealing with the loss of a loved one, it is vital to consider their memory and honour the role that they played in our lives, while also recognizing that loss is a part of life. Ultimately, the development of mental well-being and expanding consciousness can help us accept these situations as they are.
